title: Verify Subcontractor's Insurance Certificate
description: Before a new plumbing subcontractor can start work, the contract manager must verify they have submitted a valid certificate of insurance (COI).

tasks.description: Retrieve the subcontractor's file from the vendor management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The plumbing subcontractor's file is opened.

tasks.description: Check for an uploaded Certificate of Insurance and verify its expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the COI and confirms it is valid for the duration of the project.

tasks.description: Update the subcontractor's status to 'Cleared to Start Work'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The subcontractor is approved to begin work on site.
